entry.title: 3M Scotch-Brite SB27671 - Scotch-Brite Surface Conditioning Disc 4-1/2 in x No Hole A Coarse 7000046019
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type: Non-woven Discs
Price: 3.79

[shortdesc]

Scotch-Brite Surface Conditioning Disc, 4-1/2 in x NH A CRS, 50 per case

  • The Scotch-Brite™ Surface Conditioning Disc comes in a wide variety of grades and sizes and is an ideal first step for cleaning, blending, deburring, and finishing
  • The disc's durable, non-woven fibre construction conforms well on irregular or contoured surfaces without undercutting or damaging the base material, and the open web construction resists loading
  • This popular abrasive is available with aluminum oxide and silicon carbide minerals.

    Line Scotch-Brite

  • Interspersed aluminum oxide or silicon carbide abrasives produce a high cut-rate for consistent finishing. Aluminum oxide is a popu

  • Variety of abrasive grades and sizes provide an ideal starting point for cleaning, finishing, blending, and light deburring
  • Open web material runs cool and resists loading for prolonged operation
  • Conformable disc conditions surfaces without gouging, undercutting, or damaging the base material
  • Suitable for metal, composite, plastics, and other materials

entry.title: Carborundum Fibratex 54559 - Surface Prep Discs Hook & Loop Fastening System Aluminum Oxide Coarse 4-1/2 05539554559
entry.summary:
Vendor: Carborundum
Type: Non-woven Velcro & Scrim Backed Discs
Price: 3.48

[shortdesc]
  • Non-woven discs are a combination of strong synthetic mesh and quality abrasives
  • They are ideal for use on portable tools to clean and remove imperfections on metal surfaces, clean, deburr or finish a variety of surfaces, blend weld seams, or create decorative finishes
  • The open construction of the non-woven material enables aggressive cutting action and improved surface finish.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand Carborundum
    Line Fibratex
    Diameter 4-1/2 Inch
    Grade Coarse
    Product Type Non-woven Velcro & Scrim Backed Discs

    Product Information

  • A coarse grit, non-woven disc for moderate material removal and initial blending of welds and mismatched surfaces
  • Premium, high-loft nylon fiber bonded to a strong nylon scrim backing allows a thick layer of resin bond and grain for extended life, while providing added durability and stiffness
  • Premium aluminum oxide abrasive grain coating provides up to 20% higher cut rate and 50% better performance than competitive products
  • Proprietary coating method
  • thick layer of grain throughout the product extends life
    		•
